name: pnp-list-formatting-menu-link-button
title: Menu Link button
shortDescription: TThis sample allows for the creation of quick links through the use of buttons with additional features. These features include the ability to configure the button using size and color.
longDescription: This sample includes a Metro button style menu with additional features such us configuration of button using size and color, option to favorite a tile using setValue, and also includes customCardProps to show a custom hover card with the description of a tile.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
